applications.code: function generatePassword(length = 16, options = { uppercase: true, numbers: true, symbols: true }) { const lowercase = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz'; const uppercase = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'; const numbers = '0123456789'; const symbols = '!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;:,.<>?'; let chars = lowercase; if (options.uppercase) chars += uppercase; if (options.numbers) chars += numbers; if (options.symbols) chars += symbols; let password = ''; for (let i = 0; i < length; i++) { password += chars.charAt(Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)); } return password; }

applications.code: function summarizeText(text, maxLength = 100) { const sentences = text.split(/[.!?]+/).filter(s => s.trim()); if (sentences.length <= 2) return text.substring(0, maxLength); const important = sentences.sort((a, b) => b.length - a.length).slice(0, Math.min(3, sentences.length)); return important.join('. ').substring(0, maxLength) + '...'; }

applications.code: function analyzeSentiment(text) { const positive = ['å¥½', 'æ£’', 'ä¼˜ç§€', 'å–œæ¬¢', 'å¼€å¿ƒ', 'æ»¡æ„', 'ç²¾å½©', 'å®Œç¾', 'å¼ºå¤§', 'æ™ºèƒ½']; const negative = ['å·®', 'å', 'ç³Ÿç³•', 'ä¸å–œæ¬¢', 'ç”Ÿæ°”', 'å¤±æœ›', 'åƒåœ¾', 'æ— ç”¨', 'æ…¢', 'ä¸‘']; let score = 0; positive.forEach(w => { if (text.includes(w)) score++; }); negative.forEach(w => { if (text.includes(w)) score--; }); if (score > 0) return 'ğŸ˜Š æ­£é¢'; if (score < 0) return 'ğŸ˜” è´Ÿé¢'; return 'ğŸ˜ ä¸­æ€§'; }

applications.code: function extractKeywords(text, maxCount = 5) { const stopWords = ['çš„', 'äº†', 'æ˜¯', 'åœ¨', 'å’Œ', 'ä¸', 'æˆ–', 'ç­‰', 'è¿™', 'é‚£', 'æœ‰', 'æ²¡æœ‰', 'å°±', 'ä¹Ÿ', 'éƒ½', 'è€Œ', 'åŠ', 'ä¸', 'ç€']; const words = text.split(/[\s,ï¼Œã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿã€]+/).filter(w => w.length > 1 && !stopWords.includes(w)); const wordCount = {}; words.forEach(w => { const key = w; wordCount[key] = (wordCount[key] || 0) + 1; }); return Object.entries(wordCount).sort((a, b) => b[1] - a[1]).slice(0, maxCount).map(([word]) => word); }

applications.code: function translateToAI(text) { return text.split('').map(char => { const code = char.charCodeAt(0); if (code >= 0x4E00 && code <= 0x9FA5) { return String.fromCharCode(code + 96); } return char; }).join('').replace(/[a-z]/g, c => c.toUpperCase()); }
